text: James "Jim" Loscutoff Jr (February 4, 1930 â€“ December 1, 2015) was a professional American basketball player for the NBA. He played for the Boston Celtics from 1955 through 1964. He was a forward. Loscutoff played on seven Celtics championship teams between 1956 and 1964.Team Statement on Celtics Legend Jim Loscutoff He was born in San Francisco, California. Loscutoff died in Naples, Florida from complications of pneumonia and Parkinson's disease at the age of 85. ==References== Category:1930 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Boston Celtics players Category:Deaths from Parkinson's disease Category:Deaths from pneumonia Category:Infectious disease deaths in Florida Category:Sportspeople from San Francisco Category:National Basketball Association players with retired numbers
title: Jim Loscutoff
